message.body: Sorry to hear that your dishwasher is still giving you problems...
Hmm I'm not having dishwasher problems
Haha that's good. How did u know the last person i talked to did? Lol
Hahah I think your last message to them got sent to me because I got a message that said sorry you're still having dishwasher problems

Haha weird... Yeah that whole convo was bizarre. I asked how he was (assuming it was a he) and he was complaining of a sulfur smell coming from his dishwasher. Didnt hear from him for another 12 hours. Then he said it was hard for him to sleep and he bet i could sleep easily because the lord blessed me. Weiiiiiiiirdo.
Probably drunk in the latter portion of the text convo.
Hahaha well at least it sounds like he was interesting! How are you today?
Anyway, how's your saturday going thus far?
It's pretty good I'm on vacation in Arizona going to a rodeo today! Haha should be interesting

I'm good. Just arrived in pittsburgh abt 30 min ago. I came up for my friend's 21st. She and a bunch of ppl are going to the taylor swift concert so i'mjust chilling on their couch trying to figure out what to do haha
Ooh fun I've never been to Pittsburgh you're not goin to the concert with them?
No. I decided to come up at the last minute since i wasnt scheduled to work.
Ooh well I'm not really a Taylor swift fan so I'd be glad I didn't have to go haha
Lol i dont mind her, but i'm definitely not a die hard fan either.
Omg it was so ungodly hot in my friends' apt that i had to walk to a cafe to cool off haha. Is it really hot in az?
Oh yeah I heard its like in the 90s and super humid back east! It's in the 90s here but not humid so it's not too bad
That must be nice haha. Yeah it's really humid and gross. And my friends dont have a/c so it was miserable haha
Ugh yeah that's awful I live in a basement apartment in NYC without a/c it gets so gross and damp down there
Yuck. Is it ok during the winter?
Yeah my landlord keeps it really hot so it's nice and toasty
I lived in an apt my senior year of college that had automatic heat. It got so hot it was unhealthy. It hit at least 95 degrees in my bathroom.
